pullrequest.title: Set inprogress status in bitbucket when building is ongoing

content.raw:
Thanks for pointing this out. The logic is not trivial, works in this way:

 * If any of the package supplied in the list has never been installed, a message is displayed in stderr
 * if any of the packages is or has been installed in the system:
     * A header is displayed (with columns titles)
     * Each of the packges is marked at the begging with: ^in (installed) or ^rc | ^un (not installed now)

I have a working implementation, let me upload it.
content.html:
Thanks for pointing this out. The logic is not trivial, works in this way:

  • If any of the package supplied in the list has never been installed, a message is displayed in stderr
  • if any of the packages is or has been installed in the system:
    • A header is displayed (with columns titles)
    • Each of the packges is marked at the begging with: ^in (installed) or ^rc | ^un (not installed now)

I have a working implementation, let me upload it.
